pows = sample(2:5,3)

### Question 1

Use the prime factorization, $`r tot`=`r s1`$, to simplify the radical expression:

$$\sqrt{`r tot`}$$


```{r,echo=F,results='asis'}
if(params$showsol){
    cat("\\color{red}\n")
    p2 = pows %/% 2
    p3 = pows %% 2
    s2 = paste0(c(2,3,5),"^{",p2,"}",collapse="\\cdot")
    s3 = paste0(c(2,3,5),"^{",p3,"}",collapse="\\cdot")
    s4 = paste0(s2,"\\sqrt{",s3,"}")
    cat("$$",s4,"$$\n")
    aa = 2^p2[1]*3^p2[2]*5^p2[3]
    bb = 2^p3[1]*3^p3[2]*5^p3[3]
    cat("$$",aa,"\\sqrt{",bb,"}$$\n")
    cat("\\color{black}")
}

```
